Message: previously with the trainings that my last coach gave me i got injured and today i just feel pain to walk so it will be very hard to run few kilometers

I'm sorry to hear about your past injury and current discomfort. It's important to prioritize healing and regain confidence. Let's focus on gentle exercises, building up gradually when you're ready. Your well-being matters most.
today i dont' want to train because it was a very though day but i need to encourage me because I am sure that after the training I will be much more happy than now
I understand the emotional struggle, yet taking care of yourself today may lead to stronger motivation tomorrow. When ready, we'll work together to rediscover the joy in training, one step at a time.
I don't want to traing because I am starving and I prefer eating and relax

Physical needs are essential, and it's wise to address hunger first. Once refreshed, we can discuss how to plan a balanced routine incorporating self-care, nutrition, and exercise for overall wellness.
